description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-37974):

1. Download and apply the relevant updates based on your Windows version from the following links:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the integer underflow vulnerability that allows a bypass of secure boot security features.
- Ensure your system matches the specified build numbers before applying the updates.

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm that your system is on a supported version of Windows.
- Backup critical data before performing the update installation.
